column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Nothing stood out to me here.  I like that the menu highlights most popular items so we tried the burrata
column4: along with a few other items and a pitcher of sangria that was heavy on ice.  Both the food and drinks were mediocre.  The place was freezing
column5: so we politely told our server who had the air turned down
column6: but moments later it was back in full force and if you looked around everyone in the room started putting their coats on.   I think restaurant staff should be more receptive of things like that.  Overall just an ok experience.
